subject: Coaches and Managers
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams was so dispirited by her loss to a wild card in the first round of the French Open last year that she ripped up her career-long playbook and joined forces with a coach outside her family.
snippet: Serena Williams was so dispirited by her loss to a wild card in the first round of the French Open last year that she ripped up her career-long playbook and joined forces with a coach outside her family.
